name: Termin-Kategorien
output:
<?php
$output = new bs5_fragment();
$output->setVar("slice_id", "REX_SLICE_ID");
$output->setVar("article_id", "REX_ARTICLE_ID");

use Url\Url;

if (Url::resolveCurrent()) {
    $event_category = msg_event_category::get(Url::resolveCurrent()->getDatasetId());
    
    if ($event_category) {
        $output->setVar("event_category", $event_category);
        echo $output->parse('msg_event_category-details.php');
    }
} else {
        $output->setVar("hide_intro", true);
    echo $output->parse('msg_event_category-cards.php');
}

unset($output);
